command.sql: CREATE TABLE `MoneyFlow_$table_date$` ( `Version` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, `BatchNo` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, `GameId` bigint(4) DEFAULT NULL, `GameServerId` bigint(4) DEFAULT NULL, `RegisterChannelId` bigint(4) DEFAULT NULL, `DeviceId` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, `IMEI` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, `UserId` bigint(4) DEFAULT NULL, `UserName` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, `AccountId` bigint(4) DEFAULT NULL, `AccountName` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, `UserLevel` bigint(4) DEFAULT NULL, `MoneyType` bigint(4) DEFAULT NULL, `ActionType` bigint(4) DEFAULT NULL, `ReasonType` bigint(4) DEFAULT NULL, `SubReasonType` bigint(4) DEFAULT NULL, `Charge` bigint(4) DEFAULT NULL, `Donate` bigint(4) DEFAULT NULL, `Bind` bigint(4) DEFAULT NULL, `AfterCharge` bigint(4) DEFAULT NULL, `AfterDonate` bigint(4) DEFAULT NULL, `AfterBind` bigint(4) DEFAULT NULL, `OpTime` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `LogTime` datetime DEFAULT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin;

insert into MoneyFlow_$table_date$ ( Version, BatchNo, GameId, GameServerId, RegisterChannelId, DeviceId, IMEI, UserId, UserName, AccountId, AccountName, UserLevel, MoneyType, ActionType, ReasonType, SubReasonType, Charge, Donate, Bind, AfterCharge, AfterDonate, AfterBind, OpTime, LogTime )values( #Version#, #BatchNo#, #GameId#, #GameServerId#, #RegisterChannelId#, #DeviceId#, #IMEI#, #UserId#, #UserName#, #AccountId#, #AccountName#, #UserLevel#, #MoneyType#, #ActionType#, #ReasonType#, #SubReasonType#, #Charge#, #Donate#, #Bind#, #AfterCharge#, #AfterDonate, #AfterBind#, #OpTime#, #LogTime# )
